comment.author: 80924440@N06
comment._content: Hypolytrum rubescens Huber ex C.B.Clarke is a synonym of Hypolytrum longifolium subsp. rubescens (Huber ex C.B.Clarke) T.Koyama Full publication details for this name can be found in IPNI: urn:lsid:ipni.org:names:126611-2↗.

comment.author: 80924440@N06
comment._content: this reference was from www.theplantlist.org
